DOC.brief_title: Increasing Colorectal Cancer Screening Among Filipino Americans
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose research study increase colorectal cancer ( CRC ) screening among old Filipino Americans , specifically use fecal occult blood test ( FOBTs ) . We design culturally specific intervention , educational small group discussion Filipino health professional . The effect intervention test 620 Filipino Americans . Subjects recruit community-based organization church invite join 1 1/2 hour discussion health issue partner friend . A third subject discuss exercise ( control group ) , another third discus CRC receive FOBT kit , remain third discuss CRC receive FOBT kit . Three month group session , subject CRC ( intervention ) group receive letter remind get screen . All subject interview 6 month group session assess CRC screening level three group . Self-reported CRC screening verify review medical record .
